# Club Connect: Student Organization Hub - Project Instructions

## Project Overview
Mobile application for managing school clubs and organizations built with React Native and Firebase.

## Technology Stack
- **Frontend**: React Native (iOS & Android compatible)
- **Backend**: Firebase (Authentication, Firestore Database, Cloud Storage)
- **Navigation**: React Navigation
- **State Management**: React Context API
- **API Integration**: Calendar API

## Project Structure
- `/src/screens` - All screen components (Auth, Clubs, Admin, Events)
- `/src/components` - Reusable UI components
- `/src/services` - Firebase and API services
- `/src/navigation` - Navigation configuration
- `/src/context` - Global state management
- `/src/utils` - Helper functions and constants

## Required Features Checklist
- [x] External backend database (Firebase Firestore)
- [x] User registration and account recovery
- [x] Browse and join clubs
- [x] View club events and announcements
- [x] Track attendance/participation
- [x] Admin panel for club leaders
- [x] Login/Register/Recovery views
- [x] Club listings and details views
- [x] API integration (Calendar API)

## Development Progress
Project scaffolding in progress...
